alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 30 at 11:04PM CST until December 02 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier For the Neches River...including Saltwater Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 1115 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Water is about two feet over portions of Four Oaks Ranch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
